publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7902 John Lamont: Radio Bordersâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Radio Borders on achieving a 19.2% increase in listening figures over the past year; considers that the station plays a vital part in providing up-to-the-minute local news and information, particularly during the recent bad weather; further notes that Radio Borders now reaches more of its broadcast area than any other radio station in the country; recognises the hard work of all the team, and wishes the station another successful year in 2011. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson*, Christine Grahame*, Jackson Carlaw*, Bill Kidd*, Derek Brownlee*
S3M-7902 Radio Borders (lodged on 4 February 2011) Nanette Milne*, Jamie McGrigor*, Bill Aitken*, Jim Hume*
S3M-7902 Radio Borders (lodged on 4 February 2011) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-7902 Radio Borders (lodged on 4 February 2011) Gil Paterson*
